casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION DOCKET

99-578. Litton Sys., Inc. v. Tracy.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 95-A-1001. Reported at 86 Ohio St.3d 1401, 711 N.E.2d 230.

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for reconsideration in this case be, and hereby is, granted.

IT IS FURTHER ORDERED by the court that the appellee shall file a merit brief within thirty days of the date of this order and that the provisions of S.Ct.Prac.R. IX(3)(B) shall apply to oral argument in this case.

Cook, J., dissents.
